author: .paulharris
content: interop was a bit of a crazy week, so nothing got done in the beacon-apis space. if anyone wants to look at <@881905303011086387> PR https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/293 - it's approved, happy to Etan to merge assuming no objections

author: .paulharris
content:
Not unlimited bounds historic states that I'm aware of - we have some nodes we access that we maintain when we need the data, but infura was the only 'free' service I'm aware of and they don't support the free options that used to be there at genesis any more...
I could definitely be wrong, and if there is one, I'd love to know ðŸ˜„

author: jgm
content: I've taken a quick look at it, I'm not a huge fan of linking to RC versions of the specs but recognize that there isn't a great solution.  I'd somewhat prefer these linked to `master` until a release was finalized, but not enough to shout about it.

content: Not that I'm aware of, I definitely don't have a merge button available

content: If jim's happy too, im merging now.
